extension.summary: Stream the best Nollywood movies directly in Kodi
extension.description:
Watch latest 2025 Nollywood hits from iROKOtv, Ruth Kadiri, Mount Zion and more – all streamed from YouTube. No login, no subscription, no buffering.
Features: • Latest Movies, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama • Real-time search • Beautiful posters (optional TMDB) • Automatic YouTube addon installation • Works on Firestick, Android, Windows, Linux
extension.disclaimer: Uses only public, embeddable YouTube videos. No content is hosted.
